"Ministry of Healing" is another book containing valuable instructions. It is also a gift to the work; its teachings will do good to those who receive them, as its title suggests. The sale of "Ministry of Healing" is one way in which the sanitarium is to receive help. Let us take a personal interest in this matter. These two books can be handled separately or together, as may be (593) deemed advisable. And those who read them will see in them precious light. Angels will be beside those who study them to impress minds and hearts.
